section.title: sctp.established
section.para: incremented each time a new association is established.

section.title: sctp.connect_failed
section.para: incremented each time a new outgoing connection fails.

section.title: sctp.remote_shutdown
section.para: incremented each time an association is closed by the peer.

section.title: sctp.assoc_shutdown
section.para: incremented each time an association is shutdown.

section.title: sctp.comm_lost
section.para: incremented each time an established connection is close due tosome error.

section.title: sctp.sendq_full
section.para: number of failed send attempt due to exceeded buffering capacity (full kernel buffers).

section.title: sctp.send_failed
section.para: number of failed send attempt for any reason except full buffers.

section.title: sctp.send_force_retry
section.para: incremented each time a failed send is force-retried(possible only if sctp_send_retries ! = 0.
